azurerm_kusto_cluster.description: Manages Kusto (also known as Azure Data Explorer) Cluster

name.description: The name of the SKU. Valid values are: `Dev(No SLA)_Standard_D11_v2`, `Standard_D11_v2`, `Standard_D12_v2`, `Standard_D13_v2`, `Standard_D14_v2`, `Standard_DS13_v2+1TB_PS`, `Standard_DS13_v2+2TB_PS`, `Standard_DS14_v2+3TB_PS`, `Standard_DS14_v2+4TB_PS`, `Standard_L16s`, `Standard_L4s` and `Standard_L8s`

location.description: The location where the Kusto Cluster should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the Resource Group where the Kusto Cluster should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

enable_disk_encryption.description: Specifies if the cluster's disks are encrypted.

enable_streaming_ingest.description: Specifies if the streaming ingest is enabled.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

capacity.description: Specifies the node count for the cluster. Boundaries depend on the sku name.

uri.description: The FQDN of the Azure Kusto Cluster.

data_ingestion_uri.description: The Kusto Cluster URI to be used for data ingestion.

create.description: Used when creating the Kusto Cluster.

update.description: Used when updating the Kusto Cluster.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Kusto Cluster.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Kusto Cluster.
